HOW THE GAME WORKS

THERE ARE TWO TRAINGLES JOINED AS PLAYER

TOPDOWNMODE – USE UP ARROW OR W  TO MOVE UP AND

                                                             DOWN ARROW OR  S  TO MOVE DOWN

                                                             AVOID ALL THE OBSTACLES TRY TO REACH HIGH

                                                              SCORE  

NORMALNMODE –       USE RIGHT ARROW OR S TO MOVE RIGHT AND

                                                             LEFT ARROW OR  A  TO MOVELEFT

                                                             AVOID ALL THE OBSTACLES TRY TO REACH HIGH

                                                              SCORE

JUMPYNMODE –      MOUSE DOWN TO JUMP(comming in full version)
